thread.title: DeVos Hears Arguments on Obama-Era School Discipline

author: Michelle Hackman
title: DeVos Hears Arguments on Obama-Era School Discipline
text:
WASHINGTON—Education Secretary Betsy DeVos held sessions with supporters and detractors of an Obama-era school-discipline policy on Wednesday amid signs the department is weighing the rule’s repeal.
The 2014 discipline policy, developed jointly by the Education and Justice departments, directed schools to ensure that they didn’t disproportionately punish black and Hispanic students.
